SRI.M.MANOJKUMAR CHELAKKADAN R1 BY ADV. SRI.S.M.PRASANTH R1 BY ADV. SRI.K.RAMAKUMAR SR. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08.01.2021, ALONG WITH Crl.MC.6528/2013, Crl.MC.54/2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No.6528 OF 2013 202UKERII2I7 and connected cases 4 ORDER The 6% accused came up to quash the criminal proceedings against her in three cases. It is in connection with the malpractice and misappropriation done during the course of pledging of gold ornaments with a private bank. Final report was submitted. The accused No.6 was employed as cashier in the said firm. The first statement given by the defacto complainant and the additional statement excludes her alleged role in the crime. Hence, if it is proceeded further, it will not serve any purpose. The crime and its further proceedings including the final report as against accused No.6 are hereby quashed. Cr1.M.Cs are allowed accordingly. Sd/- P.
